name: Green Room
longDes: You find yourself in the master’s bedroom. The walls are a deep green. You see a ^glint# of light on the ceiling above the bed. There is a door to the $Southwest# that leads back to the second floor landing. A door to the $Northwest# leads to the pink room.
shortDes: You are in the green room, which was the master’s quarters. A large ^bed# dominates the space here. A door to the $Southwest# leads to the second floor landing. A door to the $Northwest# goes to the pink room.

features.name: bed
features.preActionDes: You follow the glint of light to the bed. You see what appears to be an @axe# sticking out from under the bed.
features.inActionDes: You take the axe from beneath the bed.
features.postActionDes: You found the axe under this bed.

features.name: glint
features.preActionDes: There is a glint on the ceiling. Tracing it, you notice something coming from the ^bed#.
features.postActionDes: The glint is there no longer. You had traced that to the axe.

features.name: north window
features.preActionDes: You can see a gazebo through the window.

features.name: east window
features.preActionDes: Nothing but a dense forest as far as the eye can see.
